Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Brilliant Breakfast. Popped into this place for breakfast before we had to drive home, the whole place was clean, the food was excellent, the service was quick, trendy decor and style. I really enjoyed it.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Chilling at the bar enjoying a huge chicken caesar salad. Well done! will be back for breakfast.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Been here before but I am on a short layover and came into the city to eat here! Delicious as always!

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: The food was good and filling. The waitresses were nice, but did not check in on us often, resulting in empty glasses. Also took away the plate from my table companion while I was still eating. Good music and nice interior.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: The best burger place I have ever been to in the heart of one of the most beautiful cities to ever be. The recipes are very creative and all the products taste good they are all fresh, plus the steaks are all black angus (very high quality meat)

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Chicken burger didn't have enough seasoning. Whiskey price reasonable but some other beverages a bit overpriced. Price/value ratio could be better overall, but they served water and extra bread without charging and offered great service ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Awesome burgers and milkshakes. More on the menu if you want all with good prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Went to Amsterdam for 3 days and ate here every morning.  Not a large menu bit what they do they do fantastically. Me and my group all loved what we ordered and never had any complaints. Staff are really friendly.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: It's very unfortunate that this happened, because I had high hopes, but it is what it is. ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Went there today and ordered a salad with no dressing as i'm allergic to Gluten. The salad comes with some bread on top, so i politely explained that i couldn't eat it and would get very sick if i did. I said i was happy to pay for another ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant if I go back to Amsterdam I would definitely go back. The waitress speaks English and Spanish which was great. The steak and the potatoes were good, for drinks I order a mojito and was the Best. For Dessert a creme brul√©. They have a variety selection for food, drinks and desserts. I highly recommend it

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Been there for lunch. It was a nice little cosy place. Location is fanstasic. Most of the customers there are tourists. Staff were good.we ordered a falafel burger. It didnt look like falafel balls and on top of it was horribly oily. Bun, ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Killer atmosphere. The goat cheese and fig salad was delicious, along with the salmon starter! When ordering a Bloody Mary, however, the waitress simply served a glass of tomato juice and vodka with the sauces on the side (Tabasco and Worcestershire) instead of mixing it in for us beforehand. That was strange.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: breakfast was without much flavour however fair for the price. blonde waitress is polite and served nice coffee but the cook english and very short was heard using bad language about our food order...???? please be more respectful

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: 2 visits on a weekend in Amsterdam, excellent food and service

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Great little coffeeshop and a wide varied menu. Just what you'd expect with greenhouse. Nice informal relaxed atmosphere and the staff were very helpful too. Would highly recommend and will definitely be back!!! üòÅüòÅüòÅ

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: The food is delicious, but the staff in the (open) kitchen is very loud. When I asked if they could be quite I heard the chef say that I should go to a one star Michelin restaurant if I had a problem with their singing. Very rude and impolite.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: I usually go for dinner, which is always very good however went for a morning coffee and was sold the absolute worst muffin I have ever seen, or eaten, I then asked for a pastry and also can tell the items were from the freezer. I tried ‚Ä¶

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: late afternoon, very loud manager drinking at bar and the poor waitress seemed annoyed. took her ten minutes to come to our table. Good Burgers that's it.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Friendly service, the atmosphere was also nice and the food was excellent. We had the chicken, avocado , Parmesan cheese and truffle mayo ;p and the scrambled eggs.. bravo üëèüèº

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Delicious Breakfast! Had the Shakshuka with Avocado. So fresh. Great coffee and really friendly staff :)

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Breakfast was nice, lacked a bit of seasoning but overall it was good. Tea was great!

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: The service acted really rudely. Not friendly and a arogant attitude.  As a transgender I feel very not welcome . To bad the burgers are good!

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Love this place. Good healthy portions and vegan choices.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Not enough vegetarian options, no vegan options yet delicious and varied food.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Definitly a place to go if you are in the area. They provide vaping equipment if you like the green, amazing and clean enviroment with amazing munchies and awsome desserts.

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Had a fantastic first day in Amsterdam breakfast here and it was a great way to start the vacation .. great food, warm and inviting atmosphere and amazing staff

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Breakfast was nice, lacked a bit of seasoning but overall it was good. Tea was great!

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Best eats late night after visiting the coffee shop next doors. The bruchetta amd bitterballen are amazing!

Name: Green House Munchies
Review Text: Great food, relaxed vibe and really good service! Would definitely recommend!
